title: IIT Bombay Launches e-PG Diploma in Integrated Circuits Design in Practice
text:

IIT Bombay Launches e-PG Diploma in Integrated Circuits Design in Practice
The 12-month diploma has been developed and delivered by faculty from the Department of Electrical Engineering. Here is all you need to know about it.
IIT Bombay Launches e-PG Diploma in Integrated Circuits Design in Practice
Photo : Twitter
The Indian Institute of Technology,
IIT Bombayhas announced pioneering e-Postgraduate Diploma (ePGD) in Integrated Circuits (IC) Design in Practice, with Simplilearn as the Ed tech partner. This online curriculum has specially been designed to empower professionals and students with cutting-edge expertise in semiconductor technology.1 year diploma has been developed and delivered by faculty from the Department of Electrical Engineering. The enrolled candidates will gain in-depth knowledge in semiconductors, digital, analog and mixed-signal design
flows, RF and MMIC circuit design and SerDes circuit design.
Talking about this new diploma offering, Prof. Shireesh Kedare, Director of
IITBombay, said , “We want to make learning more accessible to a wider pool of learners including working professionals. With these initiatives, we are moving closer to delivering specialized training in IC design, strengthening technical knowledge of learners. This will enable professionals to advance their careers in semiconductor technology and explore emerging opportunities in high-performance computing and wireless communications."He added, "India's semiconductor potential has been a major focus in recent years, and we are optimistic about becoming global leadersin the domain. IIT Bombay firmly believesthe program will contribute to our mission of creating a large pool of trained personnel who will be able to contribute to advanced technology development for the benefit of the nation.”
The ePGD program has invited engineering graduates and professionals to enroll. The online diploma aims at delivering advanced education and in-demand skills. Spanning twelve months, the seven-course curriculum is taught by IIT Bombay faculty, offering world-class training and specialized learning aligned with global industry standards.
Speaking about the launch, Mr. Kashyap Dalal, Co-founder and Chief Operating Officer of Simplilearn, said that earning an e-Postgraduate Diploma in IC Design from IIT Bombay is more than just an academic achievement—it represents excellence through world-class education and industry-relevant expertise.
He added that the program offers high-quality resources, including top-tier study materials, to ensure a rich and effective learning experience. Expressing enthusiasm about the collaboration, he emphasized that the partnership with IIT Bombay aims to shape learners who will contribute meaningfully to the future of IC design.
